welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leyton, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, vibrant street markets, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and experience all that Leyton has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers a variety of amenities and services to make your travel experience comfortable and convenient.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and Oneworld alliance flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee is required for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport offers a modern and spacious environment for passengers traveling to various domestic and international destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 90 minutes.
